text: The 1970 Copa Ganadores de Copa was the first and only edition of CONMEBOL's club tournament. Teams that failed to qualify for the Copa Libertadores played in this tournament. Eight teams from eight South American football confederations played in this tournament. Colombia and Brazil sent no representatives. Mariscal Santa Cruz defeated El Nacional in the finals.https://www.paginasiete.bo/campeones/2016/4/25/gran-hazana-mariscal- santa-cruz-cumple-anos-94394.html ==Qualified teams== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan=4|Qualified teams |- | Atlanta|| Mariscal Santa Cruz || Unión Española || El Nacional |- | Libertad || Deportivo Municipal || Rampla Juniors || Canarias |- |} ==Group stage== ===Group 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !width="165"|Team !width="20"|Pts !width="20"|GP !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|GF !width="20"|GA !width="20"|GD |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |- align=center |align=left| El Nacional |3||2||1||1||0||4||1||3 |- align=center |align=left| Canarias |2||2||0||2||0||0||0||0 |- align=center |align=left| Libertad |1||2||0||1||1||1||4||-3 |} ===Group 2=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center;" |- !width="165"|Team !width="20"|Pts !width="20"|GP !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|GF !width="20"|GA !width="20"|GD |-bgcolor=#CCFFCC |- align=center |align=left| Mariscal Santa Cruz |7||4||3||1||0||8||3||5 |- align=center |align=left| Atlanta |5||4||2||1||1||9||7||2 |- align=center |align=left| Unión Española |4||4||1||2||1||6||6||0 |- align=center |align=left| Deportivo Municipal |3||4||0||3||1||6||7||-1 |- align=center |align=left| Rampla Juniors |1||4||0||1||3||2||8||-6 |} ==Finals== |} ===Top scorer=== {| class="wikitable" !Player !Club !Goals |- | Eliseo Báez | Mariscal Santa Cruz |align=center|5 |} ==References== * RSSSF Website G
